thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 6 of 1861
thread.title: Lacey

author: Lacey
title: Lacey
text: I really enjoyed this service, I have never in my life seen better deals!! I will be booking through FlightHub from now on! I will recommend this service to anyone, anytime. I started out using the app, Hopper, and it took me here. I love the app as well, it helps me monitor prices for my next adventure. I will hopefully be making way more adventures happen in the future thanks to FlightHub!!
